title: Software subscription are ending, and it’s starting with PDF apps
content:
Macworld

Good, affordable PDF apps are pretty hard to find. If you don’t want to pay yet another monthly subscription, then check out PDF Reader Pro. This all-in-one PDF tool can edit, convert, annotate, and more, and it’s only $39.99 for a lifetime subscription. 

PDF Reader Pro isn’t just for reading; you can actually edit your documents. Edit text, swap out pictures, and highlight all the important bits. Basically, you can make the PDF do what you want. And if you’re reading a long document, it’s got a night mode that’s way easier on the eyes.

You can also merge pages, split them up, and even password-protect files. And if you deal with forms or scanned documents, it’s got you covered there, too, with built-in OCR capabilities. 

It’s only $39.99 to get a PDF Reader Pro Premium Lifetime License, but it won’t stay that way.
